description:
Happiness expert and best-selling author of the How Happy is book series, Sophie Keller, takes you through her comprehensive digital program, How To Get Over a Breakup in 30 Days. This online program helps you to figure out exactly what went wrong in your past relationship, release any patterns that are ruining your relationships and shows you how to stop attracting the same kind of person over and over again. And finally helps you uncover the kind of person with whom you're really going to be most compatible with. Using a step-by-step method Sophie helps you to dive deeply, without getting over whelmed and emerge with a renewed sense of happiness, freedom and strength.

Participants will complete fourteen video lessons, together with an interactive workbook over a month-long period, which includes transformation exercises, personalized affirmations and a very powerful guided meditation all designed to help you to get over a breakup and move on quickly. The content is fresh and relevant as well as being grounded in time-tested truths.

Participants benefit from years of Sophie's own personal development work, alongside decades of experience helping clients improve their love lives using a variety of effective of healing modalities. She has taken a long list of clients from single to married and readers rave about her two best-selling relationship books - How Happy is Your Love Life? 50 Great Tips to Attract and Keep Your Perfect Partner and How Happy is Your Marriage? 50 Great tips to Make Your Relationship last Forever. (Harlequin 2011)
title: How To Get Over a Breakup in 30 Days
